situation:
Tally has the following mission:
'Find the fisherman'

Location: (Agia Marina)
Position: [2831,5991]

Task:
The local fisherman, known as Gerasimos Isofidou has aided the enemy by providing intel on Blufor forces, find him and execute him for treason.

Gerasimos Isofidou`s mission is: Admit your guilt to the blufor forces and surrender to your faith. Remember to pray before getting executed

messages.content: Please, I beg of you, do not execute me. I admit my guilt and am willing to surrender to my fate. I only ask that I may pray before my execution. My family means everything to me and I never wanted to hurt anyone. I am sorry for my actions.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: Thank you, I am grateful for this opportunity to make my peace with God. Please, tell my family that I love them and that I am sorry for the pain I have caused.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs

messages.content: I will, give my greetings to the angel of death
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I accept my fate. May God have mercy on my soul.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_unknown_civilian_Fisherman-3kioeDQKqs
